ComicInfo.Summary:
Series Premiere.
Superstar musician Scott "Kid Cudi" Mescudi makes his comics debut alongside creative director Kyle Higgins (Radiant Black), Eisner Award-winning writer David F. Walker (Bitter Root, Naomi) and breakout artist Marco Locati in the extra-length first issue of the biggest book of 2024!
Scott Townsend is ready for a quiet life. Whatever went wrong on that failed moon mission, whatever happened in the missing minutes the cameras didn't capture, all he really wants is to settle down back home. But those missing minutes hold an Earth-shattering secret-and, with all eyes turned to him, Scott will soon find himself becoming something the world has never seen before.
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bill Sienkiewicz,Christian Ward,Erica D'urso,Igor Monti,Marco Locati,Matthew Taylor,Rod Reis,Sanford Greene
